name: War Suits
description:
War Suits is a local multiplayer with scrambling giant robots. Test and choose your gears, each with their own unique skills, and make the best fighter for your playstyle!

This game was made in under 48h for Global Game Jam 2020. 

HOW TO PLAY:

Player 1:
W A S D - Move
E - Shoot
Space - Jump
Left Ctrl  - Special
Player 2:
 Arrows - Move
 Delete - Shoot
 End - Jump
 Page Down - Special
